"Book" - A virtual reality platform that transports users into the pages of a book.
"BookScape" - A 3D modeling tool that allows authors to create interactive visualizations of their book settings and characters.
"BookGenius" - An AI-powered tool that generates personalized book recommendations based on a user's reading history and preferences.
"BookMorph" - A software that enables authors to transform their written works into interactive games or immersive experiences.
"BookEcho" - A mobile app that uses voice recognition to read aloud books and allows users to interact with the text in real-time.
